markdown: **Activate** <actions string="Single Action" />envision ([metamagic](/Traits.aspx?ID=107))    **Effect** If your next action is to cast a [conjuration](/Traits.aspx?ID=33) spell prepared from this grimoire that summons one or more creatures, you summon creatures from the _illuminated folio_ rather than their usual source. These summoned creatures appear as living illustrations, granting them resistance to physical damage equal to half their level and weakness 5 to fire and to any ability with the [water](/Traits.aspx?ID=165) trait. They can also fold themselves up to pass through spaces only an inch or so wide as part of their movement.
